thread.title: Louis Vuitton Opens Its First Men’s Pop-Up Store In Milan
thread.title_full: Louis Vuitton Opens Its First Men’s Pop-Up Store In Milan

author: David Fischer
title: Louis Vuitton Opens Its First Men’s Pop-Up Store In Milan
text:
Visit the original post to see all 9 images from this gallery. 
In celebration of Milan Fashion Week, Louis Vuitton has opened up its very first men’s pop-up shop in the Italian capital. Located in the Italian city’s Brera district, the temporary store carries the French luxury brand’s full men’s Spring/Summer 2017 collection, including fashion, accessories, bags, shoes and more. The store pays homage to Africa, using the art of the Chapman Brothers, matching the runway collection of the season, designed by Kim Jones. Not only is the African inspiration present through graphics on the products and the wallpapers, but also through the distinct choice of materials and furniture in the shop. The Louis Vuitton pop-up will remain open through January 29.
POP UP STORE LOUIS VUITTON 
Via Fiori Chiari angolo Via Formentini 9
Open from January 14th until January 29th, 2017
Opening hours: everyday 11.30 am – 08.30 pm
